subject: Welcome to the Statly Beta-Test Program!
text:
Dear {fullname},

We are delighted to inform you that you have successfully joined the beta-tests for our app with Spotify API integration - Statly. Thank you for your interest in our project!

As a beta-tester, you will have the opportunity to try out the latest features of Statly before they are released to the public, and provide valuable feedback that will help us improve the app for everyone.To get started, please log in the Statly app.

Thank you again for joining the beta-tests. We look forward to hearing your feedback and working together to make Statly the best it can be!

Best regards,
Statly
